data.title: Strategy CEO Says $1.44B Cash Reserve Aims to Calm Bitcoin-Slump Fears
data.description: Strategy CEO Phong Le says the company’s newly built $1.44 billion cash reserve is designed to quiet investor anxiety over its ability to withstand a sharp downturn in Bitcoin. Key Takeaways: Strategy built a $1.44B cash reserve to ease investor fears about its ability to meet dividend and debt obligations. ...
data.keywords: Phong Le, Strategy, buy Bitcoin, dividend payments, cash reserve, Bitcoin, raising capital
